item.title: New Internship Opportunities for IonSat - Fall 2022
item.author: antoine.tavant@polytechnique.edu (Antoine Tavant)
item.description: Join the IonSat project! Ionsat is a 6U student nanosatellite equipped with an electric propulsion engine, dedicated to the demonstration of the feasibility of nanosatellite missions in very low orbit (<300km).

item.title: Signature of the education sponsorship

item.description: Growth of spatial engineering at the Ecole Polytechnique If the CSEP has been training polytechnic students in spatial engineering for almost 10 years, it is only within the framework of its projects.

item.title: IonSat
